org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel
Interface IRunElement

All Known Implementing Classes:
XWPFHyperlinkRun, XWPFRun, XWPFSDT
public interface IRunElement

Common interface for things that can occur where a run (text with common stylings) can, eg XWPFRun or XWPFSDT. More methods to follow shortly!
